title: Role of biofuels, electro-fuels, and blue fuels for shipping: environmental and economic life cycle considerations
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,6393-6418
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01641F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Fayas Malik Kanchiralla, Selma Brynolf, Alvar Mjelde
This study analyses different decarbonization strategies for shipping including uptake of e-fuels, blue fuels and biofuels, battery electric propulsion and onboard carbon capture technology from a life cycle perspective.
